name: TankLab
description:
Operate the tank to fire bullets! Defeat your opponents and claim victory!
Choose your favorite skill and conquer the field!
A pop and simple shooting game.

this game
1. "Challenge Mode" where you aim to clear all stages by defeating tanks
2. "Local match mode" where up to 4 people can play against each other on one computer
3. "Online mode" where you can fight someone online 1on1
You can enjoy 3 different modes.
You can enjoy it alone or with a large number of people!

And even more!
Simple appearance and easy operation!
It is a book that even those who are not good at games can enjoy.
